meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6586.

td.p: Tim Kleiman, an investment analyst from New York, New York
Lisa Byatt, a technical writer from Amherst, New Hampshire
Matt Eichenbaum, an orthopedic surgeon from Kennett Square, Pennsylvania (whose 1-day cash winnings total $25,497)

tr.td: DOCTOR! DOCTOR!
YOU NEED A LAB TEST
BLOOD WORK
CAT SCAN
(You scan the clue and identify the cat breed.)
IT'S THE "FLU"
LOOKS LIKE YOU'RE GONNA MAKE IT
